column1: MRI size (128, 256, 1) in weighting T2, showing the head of a man of 37 years old, of sagittal section n°112 initiated from the right hemisphere of the skull. The image notably reveals the presence of: the white matter of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 5191.6992 mm³, the cortex of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 4409.9121 mm³, the left lateral ventricle of volume 328.2715 mm³, the white matter of left hemisphere of cerebellum of volume 624.9023 mm³, the left cerebellar cortex of volume 1588.6230 mm³, the left thalamus of volume 454.8340 mm³, the left caudate nucleus of volume 317.7246 mm³, the left putamen of volume 30.3223 mm³, the left globus pallidus of volume 69.8730 mm³, the brainstem of volume 284.7656 mm³, the left hippocampus of volume 29.0039 mm³, the left amygdala of volume 30.3223 mm³, the left nucleus accumbens of volume 21.0938 mm³ and the left ventral diencephalon of volume 158.2031 mm³.
